originalText.text: Joseph Cleaners are AMAZINGLY good &  they did an excellent job cleaning a dark green comforter that I brought in.  After the terribly hot summer (& our cat making herself comfortable on it), it needed a thorough cleaning.  When I got it back, it looked brand new!  I like the people there too -- they're friendly and efficient and deserve high praise.

originalText.text: I had an emergency and needed a gown steamed for a themed party over the weekend. I arrived asking for help and the staff & owner came out to assist me in the middle of an extremely busy day. They were kind enough to steam my beautiful gown and I was able to wear it to the winter wonderland party. I noticed as my dress was getting steamed, the owner was also greeting every customer by name and vice versa. Needless to say they won me over and I will be utilizing them moving forward. Love supporting local businesses like this. Thank you Larry & team!

originalText.text: This is an cleaners is amazing. The staff is very cordial and accommodating.  I asked them to deliver the same day it was a holiday it was delivered to my building early.  I also needed them to sew a button it was delivered the same day as well. I cannot say enough nice thinks about the staff and the service.

originalText.text: Best dry cleaner I've ever used in my life. My clothes look brand new, and the pricing is in the perfect range. I brought in 13 tops ranging from cashmere to silk that have never looked better and got them back in a 2 day turnaround. Go here!

originalText.text: Joseph Cleaners is the BEST !!!! I bring them everything from laundry, dry cleaning, tailoring, shoe repair. Couldn’t ask for a better cleaners! The staff is so helpful, and the owner Larry is so nice and accommodating! Pickup and delivery, great service, what more could you ask for!
